page.para: One day, I went to the fun fair with my fam/i/ly.
Mum and dad bought things for us. I got a bright blue cap.
On the way home, a strong wind came. It blew my cap a/way.
My cap flew in/to a big tree. It got stuck on a branch.
I was ver/y up/set. I cried and cried. I could not eat my din/ner.
That night, the moon came out. It looked down at my cap in the tree.
The moon tried on my cap, and smiled! I smiled too.
The next day, my mum gave me a shin/y red cap. I loved it.
That night, the moon and I both wore our caps. We smiled. We were hap/py.
